error_fixes.problem_type: alt attribute is missing in img tag

Input element missing associated label or label is empty

success_criteria: Audio or video element should avoid automatically playing audio
fixed_example:
<video controls>
<source src="bookstore-video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

error_fixes.problem_type: Audio or video element should avoid automatically playing audio

success_criteria: <b> <i> or <font> tag should not be used

error_fixes.problem_type: <b> <i> or <font> tag should not be used
Use of <font> tag
error_fixes.offending_line: <font> tag is used in the form which is not recommended for accessibility.
error_fixes.fixed_line: Replace the <font> tag with CSS for styling.

error_fixes.problem_type: Using <b>, <i>, or <font> tags for styling
error_fixes.offending_line: <b> or <i> tags are used for styling within the form.
error_fixes.fixed_line: Instead of using <b> or <i> tags for styling within forms, utilize CSS to style elements.

error_fixes.problem_type: Using <b>, <i>, or <font> tags
Font tag used
Usage of <b> tag
error_fixes.offending_line: <b> or <i> tag should not be used

error_fixes.problem_type: Use of <font> tag
Using <b> tag
Use of <b>, <i> or <font> tag
Font tag used

success_criteria: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible

error_fixes.problem_type: onmousedown event missing onkeydown event or script is not keyboard accessible
error_fixes.offending_line:
<button type="submit" style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(76, 175, 80);">
                Search Cars
            </button>
error_fixes.fixed_line:
<button type="submit" style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(76, 175, 80);" onkeydown="if(event.keyCode===13) { this.click(); }">
                Search Cars
            </button>

input element has more than one associated label
error_fixes.offending_line:

            <input type="radio" id="2" name="fav_number" value="2">
